analysis.description:
BasicToken.totalSupply_ (/unique_chucks/11/0xd166503b4fcc75630cc66ad7ab7023336b3dd04a.sol#238) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- totalSupply (/unique_chucks/11/0xd166503b4fcc75630cc66ad7ab7023336b3dd04a.sol#240-242)

Reentrancy in OpiriaCrowdsale._processPurchase (/unique_chucks/11/0xd166503b4fcc75630cc66ad7ab7023336b3dd04a.sol#1051-1058):
	External calls:
	- _deliverTokens(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/11/0xd166503b4fcc75630cc66ad7ab7023336b3dd04a.sol#1057)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- soldTokens (/unique_chucks/11/0xd166503b4fcc75630cc66ad7ab7023336b3dd04a.sol#1058)

Reentrancy in OpiriaCrowdsale.distributeBonus (/unique_chucks/11/0xd166503b4fcc75630cc66ad7ab7023336b3dd04a.sol#1138-1153):
	External calls:
	- _deliverTokens(addresses[i],bonusAmount) (/unique_chucks/11/0xd166503b4fcc75630cc66ad7ab7023336b3dd04a.sol#1143)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- bonusOf (/unique_chucks/11/0xd166503b4fcc75630cc66ad7ab7023336b3dd04a.sol#1148)

Reentrancy in OpiriaCrowdsale.sendTokensTo (/unique_chucks/11/0xd166503b4fcc75630cc66ad7ab7023336b3dd04a.sol#1097-1106):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(MintableToken(token).mint(to,amount)) (/unique_chucks/11/0xd166503b4fcc75630cc66ad7ab7023336b3dd04a.sol#1100-1102)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- soldTokens (/unique_chucks/11/0xd166503b4fcc75630cc66ad7ab7023336b3dd04a.sol#1102-1105)

Reentrancy in OpiriaCrowdsale.withdrawBonus (/unique_chucks/11/0xd166503b4fcc75630cc66ad7ab7023336b3dd04a.sol#1154-1163):
	External calls:
	- _deliverTokens(msg.sender,bonusOf[msg.sender]) (/unique_chucks/11/0xd166503b4fcc75630cc66ad7ab7023336b3dd04a.sol#1156-1158)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- bonusOf (/unique_chucks/11/0xd166503b4fcc75630cc66ad7ab7023336b3dd04a.sol#1159-1160)

OpiriaCrowdsale.distributeBonus (/unique_chucks/11/0xd166503b4fcc75630cc66ad7ab7023336b3dd04a.sol#1138-1153) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-MintableToken(token).finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/11/0xd166503b4fcc75630cc66ad7ab7023336b3dd04a.sol#1152-1153)

OpiriaCrowdsale.withdrawBonus (/unique_chucks/11/0xd166503b4fcc75630cc66ad7ab7023336b3dd04a.sol#1154-1163) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-MintableToken(token).finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/11/0xd166503b4fcc75630cc66ad7ab7023336b3dd04a.sol#1161-1163)

OpiriaCrowdsale.claimReservedTokens (/unique_chucks/11/0xd166503b4fcc75630cc66ad7ab7023336b3dd04a.sol#1183-1199) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-MintableToken(token).finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/11/0xd166503b4fcc75630cc66ad7ab7023336b3dd04a.sol)

OpiriaCrowdsale.addBonusBatch has external calls inside a loop:
	- require(bool)(PausableToken(token).balanceOf(recipients[i]) > 0) (/unique_chucks/11/0xd166503b4fcc75630cc66ad7ab7023336b3dd04a.sol#1116-1117)

Reentrancy in OpiriaCrowdsale.addBonusBatch (/unique_chucks/11/0xd166503b4fcc75630cc66ad7ab7023336b3dd04a.sol#1112-1127):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(PausableToken(token).balanceOf(recipients[i]) > 0) (/unique_chucks/11/0xd166503b4fcc75630cc66ad7ab7023336b3dd04a.sol#1116-1117)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- bonusOf (/unique_chucks/11/0xd166503b4fcc75630cc66ad7ab7023336b3dd04a.sol#1125-1126)
	- soldTokens (/unique_chucks/11/0xd166503b4fcc75630cc66ad7ab7023336b3dd04a.sol#1123-1125)
	- totalBonus (/unique_chucks/11/0xd166503b4fcc75630cc66ad7ab7023336b3dd04a.sol#1122-1123)

Reentrancy in OpiriaCrowdsale.distributeBonus (/unique_chucks/11/0xd166503b4fcc75630cc66ad7ab7023336b3dd04a.sol#1138-1153):
	External calls:
	- _deliverTokens(addresses[i],bonusAmount) (/unique_chucks/11/0xd166503b4fcc75630cc66ad7ab7023336b3dd04a.sol#1143)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalBonus (/unique_chucks/11/0xd166503b4fcc75630cc66ad7ab7023336b3dd04a.sol#1145)

Reentrancy in OpiriaCrowdsale.unlockTokenTransfers (/unique_chucks/11/0xd166503b4fcc75630cc66ad7ab7023336b3dd04a.sol#1127-1138):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(PausableToken(token).paused()) (/unique_chucks/11/0xd166503b4fcc75630cc66ad7ab7023336b3dd04a.sol#1131-1135)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- bonusUnlockTime (/unique_chucks/11/0xd166503b4fcc75630cc66ad7ab7023336b3dd04a.sol#1135-1136)

Reentrancy in OpiriaCrowdsale.withdrawBonus (/unique_chucks/11/0xd166503b4fcc75630cc66ad7ab7023336b3dd04a.sol#1154-1163):
	External calls:
	- _deliverTokens(msg.sender,bonusOf[msg.sender]) (/unique_chucks/11/0xd166503b4fcc75630cc66ad7ab7023336b3dd04a.sol#1156-1158)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalBonus (/unique_chucks/11/0xd166503b4fcc75630cc66ad7ab7023336b3dd04a.sol#1158-1159)

TimedCrowdsale.constructor (/unique_chucks/11/0xd166503b4fcc75630cc66ad7ab7023336b3dd04a.sol#823-842) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_openingTime >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/11/0xd166503b4fcc75630cc66ad7ab7023336b3dd04a.sol#830-835)

TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (/unique_chucks/11/0xd166503b4fcc75630cc66ad7ab7023336b3dd04a.sol#846-854) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > closingTime (/unique_chucks/11/0xd166503b4fcc75630cc66ad7ab7023336b3dd04a.sol#853-854)
